file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 79-11-03-04 - SELF-CLOSING SENSOR VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SELF-CLOSING SENSOR VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the Self-Closing Sensor Valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SELF-CLOSING SENSOR VALVE - RE- ALL 79-11-03-000-801-A MOVAL SELF-CLOSING SENSOR VALVE - IN- ALL 79-11-03-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 79-11-03 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 79-11-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SELF-CLOSING SENSOR VALVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) To do the task, see the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work Stand To get access to the engine oil tank 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 79-11-03 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Put the work stand in the work area. (3) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400) to get access to the engine oil tank. J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the Self-Closing Sensor Valve. Refer to the last revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 79-11-03 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 79-11-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. SELF-CLOSING SENSOR VALVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do the task, see the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING AMM TASK 71-71-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE DRAIN LINES - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work Stand To get access to the engine oil tank 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Install the Self-Closing Sensor Valve. Refer to the last revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 79-11-03 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the tank oil drain line ( AMM TASK 71-71-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (3) Remove the work stand. (4) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • START 1/2. (5) Refer to the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 to do the related check after an engine LRU maintenance procedure, as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 79-11-03 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
